jobsJson.descriptionPlain: Gojek is seeking a talented, strategically focused analytics leader to drive business insights, deliver business   functions-facing   solutions, build a data-driven decision making environment as well as in charge of data architecture for GoFood and its derivatives. The leader will accountable for both strategic and analytics   projects/implementation using sophisticated analytics techniques to unlock GoFood growth such as funnel drop off analytics or profitability analysis by region to drive recommendation on pricing scheme. The candidate must also have strong influence and people leadership skills to effectively run a  diverse team of business analysts, data   scientists, and data engineers; drive project prioritisation and roadmap; partner effectively with more large scale of business functions. You will be part of a business thriving to create as much positive social impact as possible for culinary business players including Small Medium Business in Indonesia and become the largest food delivery service in SEA!
jobsJson.description: Gojek is seeking a talented, strategically focused analytics leader to drive business insights, deliver business functions-facing solutions, build a data-driven decision making environment as well as in charge of data architecture for GoFood and its derivatives. The leader will accountable for both strategic and analytics projects/implementation using sophisticated analytics techniques to unlock GoFood growth such as funnel drop off analytics or profitability analysis by region to drive recommendation on pricing scheme. The candidate must also have strong influence and people leadership skills to effectively run a diverse team of business analysts, data scientists, and data engineers; drive project prioritisation and roadmap; partner effectively with more large scale of business functions. You will be part of a business thriving to create as much positive social impact as possible for culinary business players including Small Medium Business in Indonesia and become the largest food delivery service in SEA!
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Be responsible for setting the departmental vision and culture and championing for the use of data for key business decision making in order to achieve Food Group and company OKRs.
  • Lead the business intelligence analytics in strategy development with regard to the collection, manipulation, and analysis of data for various business functions/departments such as marketing, sales, operations, and products, among others. 
  • Create a data-driven approach for the purpose of generating business insights data analytics, information visualisation, and addressing unanswered business issues in a proactive manner.
  • Lead initiatives relating to the optimization of existing departmental data needs, process improvements, strategy and policies that organizations can work together more effectively (organizational efficiency). 
  • Mentor and develop team’s capabilities and set up learning and development plans for them. 
  • Directly lead a team of approximately 15 people while exerting leadership and influence across functions and around 22 stakeholders

• More than 7 years of experience in Business Intelligence and/or Analytics, with experience of taking on roles with increasing responsibility
  • Minimum 3 years of Management (leading a team) experience
  • Excellent analytical, research and problem-solving skills with high-level attention to detail
  • Experience in startup(s), or enterprises which have created solutions at scale,  is preferable
  • Knowledge of BI best practices/methodologies, including reporting tools, querying tools, data analytics methodologies, and data visualisation
  • Experience with SQL and reporting techniques with proficiency in data analytics tools (R and/or Python)
  • Great communication and presentation skills plus ability to work with cross-functional team, manage delivery expectation, and influence leadership
